[binaries]
c = 'i686-linux-gnu-gcc'
ar = 'i686-linux-gnu-ar'
as = 'i686-linux-gnu-as'
nm = 'i686-linux-gnu-nm'
strip = 'i686-linux-gnu-strip'
exe_wrapper = 'env'

[host_machine]
system='linux'
cpu_family='x86'
cpu='i686'
endian='little'

[properties]
c_args = ['-march=core2', '-mfpmath=sse', '-msse2']
needs_exe_wrapper = true
